title: Roblox, BlackBerry, Pfizer, Adagio Therapeutics: What to Watch in the Stock Market Today
sub_head: Tests suggested that Pfizer’s Covid-19 pill could work against Omicron; An analyst cut its rating of Adagio Therapeutics shares
body:
Futures are in a holding pattern ahead of a policy decision from the Federal Reserve. Here’s what we’re watching in Wednesday’s trading:
